comments.comment: Have you received feedback from your local fire departments?
This will not fund on Kickstarter, you will need to find other government sources to fund.
FYI … I an co-author on several technical papers on wind-aided firespread.
Hey Freddy! Thanks so much for Backing FLARE. I greatly appreciate the support!

I have talked to some Local Fire departments who really liked the idea. they gave me some amazing feedback, to which I have modified plans, and adapted Flares Design to accommodate the concerns they voiced! But overall they thought it could become a really viable tool for a lot of stations near remote locations.

As for the funding, We have plans to use the Kickstarter Funds to Develop the working prototype of Flare. At which point we have more leverage to bid for government contracts, to help us get to our eventual goals! The kickstarter is simply a stepping stone to help us get off the ground!

It's very possible I’ve actually read one of your technical papers! That is super cool! I've read a couple by T&F, ResearchGate, IAFSS and the U.S Forest Service. Thanks so much for your contributions in helping people like myself learn more about wildfire behaviors.
